trans_title: 电影连连看 第一季
introduction: Series looking at the history of favourite films.Series 11、10 Sep. 2007 Four Weddings and a Funeral2、17 Sep. 2007 The Commitments3、24 Sep. 2007 Billy Elliot4、1 Oct. 2007 Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels5、8 Oct. 2007 Bend It Like Beckham6、15 Oct. 2007 Shakespeare in Love7、22 Oct. 2007 Brassed Off8、5 Nov. 2007 Gregory's GirlSeries 21、7 Jan. 2009 Monty Python and the Holy Grail2、14 Jan. 2009 Summer Holiday3、21 Jan. 2009 Sliding Doors4、26 Jan. 2009 Trainspotting5、4 Feb. 2009 Shirley Valentine6、11 Feb. 2009 Buster7、18 Feb. 2009 Local Hero8、25 Feb. 2009 Calendar Girls
